newsitem.title: CHILE: Chile Apr industrial output up 4.8 pct-Sofofa.
newsitem.headline: Chile Apr industrial output up 4.8 pct-Sofofa.

text.p: Chilean industrial output rose 4.8 percent in April compared with the same month of last year, the Sofofa industrial group said Wednesday.
Sales by industry were 7.4 percent higher in April than in April 1996, Sofofa added.
April's industrial production was 0.2 percent higher than in March, while sales were 1.4 percent higher, Sofofa said.
During the first four months of the year, industrial output was 1.0 percent higher than in the same period of 1996, while sales were 4.2 percent higher.
The sectors which grew most strongly in the first four months of 1997 were glass production, up 36.3 percent, and household electric goods, up 31.3 percent.
Leather shoe output slumped 17.6 percent from January to April, while food production slipped 16.4 percent.
